duties_responsibilities.duty: Produce private label marketing materials, digital campaigns, and non-complex website portals in collaboration with the marketing manager.
Understand and utilize professional software for electronic mechanicals to output graphics properly in print or digital environment.
Have knowledge of vector vs raster and the ability to apply it in graphic design work.
Learn new software interfaces quickly to keep up with a rapidly changing industry.
Integrate digital environments for real-time distribution of graphics and information, as required.

education_certification.credential: 1 to 2 years’ experience in graphic design and/or web design
